static double goal_pos_change_threshold ()
 The threshold by which the goal needs to change before we require a replan.
 
static double goal_vel_change_threshold ()
 The threshold by which the goal velocity needs to change before we require a replan.
 
static RJ::Seconds partial_replan_lead_time ()
 The duration of the previous path to reuse (from the beginning) in a partial replan. This will be used if possible, although in some cases a full replan will be required.
 

Detailed Description

Handles the replanning strategy for an RRT plan generator.

This is used to avoid constantly replanning.

Member Function Documentation

◆ create_plan()

Trajectory planning::Replanner::create_plan ( Replanner::PlanParams  params,
Trajectory  previous 
)
static

Top-level function to create a plan, possibly using part or all of the previous trajectory.

Parameters
paramsThe parameters (start and goal) to use to make a plan.
previousThe previous trajectory. Can be moved into this function if it is no longer needed.
Returns
A planned trajectory.
